cause.description:
This is a political cause.
Ryan Gonzales is a registered voter with the Natural Law Party.
He will run as a Republican in 2028.
More details will come in the following 20 years.
1. Abortion will be made illegal (if not done so by '28)
2. Large Electrified Fences will be established on the Northern and Southern Borders of the USA (if not done so by '28)
3. We will make military advances to control Canada (if not done so by '28)
4. Mexico will become a part of Canada (if not done so by '28)
5. We will control 90% or more of the "Free" World. (if not done so by '28)
cause.mission: Get Ryan Gonzales Elected President in 2028
cause.name: Ryan Gonzales for President in '28
